atom:content.xhtml:div:
yulup-0.2.4-r22910.xpi (February 23, 2007)
Changelog:
Don't open Atom Sidebar by default.
Improved surround/unsurround.
Discover MIME-types of locally opened documents.
Editor toolbar for local HTML documents.
Mark editor as readonly and prevent re-fill artifacts from rendering while contents are being computed.
